<a name="FSStream"></a>

## FSStream : DataStream
A scramjet stream that items point to filesystem items like files, directories etc. Provides methods like `stat`,
`contents`.

This is usefull for listing filesystem etc.

**Kind**: global class  
**Extends**: <code>DataStream</code>
